verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician אַל־ [T'al- תַּשְׁחֵ֗ת <WH516> tash-Chet, Altaschith לְדָוִ֥ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid of David מִכְתָּֽם׃ <WH4387> mich-Tam. Michtam הַֽאֻמְנָ֗ם <WH552> ha-'um-Nam, Do ye indeed אֵ֣לֶם <WH482> 'E-lem congregation צֶ֭דֶק <WH6664> Tze-dek righteousness תְּדַבֵּר֑וּן <WH1696> te-dab-be-Run; speak מֵישָׁרִ֥ים <WH4339> mei-sha-Rim uprightly תִּ֝שְׁפְּט֗וּ <WH8199> tish-pe-Tu, avenge בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei O ye sons אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> 'a-Dam. man

אַף־ <WH637> 'af- No בְּלֵב֮ <WH3820> be-Lev Yea in heart עוֹלֹ֪ת <WH5766> o-Lot wickedness תִּפְעָ֫ל֥וּן <WH6466> tif-'A-Lun ye work בָּאָ֡רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz in the earth חֲמַ֥ס <WH2555> cha-Mas the violence יְ֝דֵיכֶ֗ם <WH3027> ye-dei-Chem, of your hands תְּפַלֵּֽסֽוּן׃ <WH6424> te-fal-Le-Sun. ye weigh

זֹ֣רוּ <WH2114> Zo-ru are estranged רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im The wicked מֵרָ֑חֶם <WH7358> me-Ra-chem; from the womb תָּע֥וּ <WH8582> ta-'U they go astray מִ֝בֶּ֗טֶן <WH990> mib-Be-ten, as soon as they be born דֹּבְרֵ֥י <WH1696> doe-Rei speaking כָזָֽב׃ <WH3577> cha-Zav. lies

חֲמַת־ <WH2534> cha-mat- Their poison לָ֗מוֹ la-mo, כִּדְמ֥וּת <WH1823> kid-Mut [is] like חֲמַת־ <WH2534> cha-mat- the poison נָחָ֑שׁ <WH5175> na-Chash; of a serpent כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> ke-mov- Like פֶ֥תֶן <WH6620> Fe-ten adder חֵ֝רֵ֗שׁ <WH2795> che-Resh, [they are] like the deaf יַאְטֵ֥ם <WH331> ya'-Tem [that] stoppeth אָזְנֽוֹ׃ <WH241> a-ze-No. her ear

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher So לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- does not יִ֭שְׁמַע <WH8085> Yish-ma' Which will not hearken לְק֣וֹל <WH6963> le-Kol to the voice מְלַחֲשִׁ֑ים <WH3907> me-la-cha-Shim; of charmers חוֹבֵ֖ר <WH2266> cho-Ver caster חֲבָרִ֣ים <WH2267> cha-va-Rim of spells מְחֻכָּֽם׃ <WH2449> me-chuk-Kam. never so wisely

אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> 'elo-Him, O God הֲרָס־ <WH2040> ha-ros- Break שִׁנֵּ֥ימוֹ <WH8127> shin-Nei-mov their teeth בְּפִ֑ימוֹ <WH6310> be-Fi-mov; in their mouth מַלְתְּע֥וֹת <WH4459> mal-te-'ot the great teeth כְּ֝פִירִ֗ים <WH3715> ke-fi-Rim, of the young lions נְתֹ֣ץ׀ <WH5422> ne-Totz break out יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. O LORD

יִמָּאֲס֣וּ <WH3988> yim-ma-'a-Su Let them melt away כְמוֹ־ <WH3644> che-mov- like מַ֭יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim as waters יִתְהַלְּכוּ־ <WH1980> yit-hal-le-chu- [which] run continually לָ֑מוֹ la-mo; יִדְרֹ֥ךְ <WH1869> yid-Roch [when] he bendeth; חִצֹּו chitz-tzov כחִ֝צָּ֗יו <WH2671> chitz-Tzav, archer קכְּמ֣וֹ <WH3644> ke-Mo like יִתְמֹלָֽלוּ׃ <WH4135> yit-mo-La-lu. let them be as cut in pieces

כְּמ֣וֹ <WH3644> ke-Mo as שַׁ֭בְּלוּל <WH7642> be-lul As a snail תֶּ֣מֶס <WH8557> Te-mes [which] melteth יַהֲלֹ֑ךְ <WH1980> ya-ha-Loch; let [every one of them] pass away נֵ֥פֶל <WH5309> Ne-fel [like] the untimely birth אֵ֝֗שֶׁת <WH802> 'E-shet, of a woman בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- never חָ֥זוּ <WH2372> Cha-zu [that] they may not see שָֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> Sha-mesh. the sun

בְּטֶ֤רֶם <WH2962> be-Te-rem Before יָבִ֣ינוּ <WH995> ya-Vi-nu can feel סִּֽירֹתֵיכֶ֣ם <WH5518> si-ro-tei-Chem Before your pots אָטָ֑ד <WH329> 'a-Tad; the thorns כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> ke-mov- alike חַ֥י <WH2416> chai both living כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> ke-mov- alike חָ֝ר֗וֹן <WH2740> cha-Ron, and in [his] wrath יִשְׂעָרֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH8175> yis-'a-Ren-nu. he shall take them away as with a whirlwind

יִשְׂמַ֣ח <WH8055> yis-Mach shall rejoice צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> Tzad-dik The righteous כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- when חָזָ֣ה <WH2372> cha-Zah when he seeth נָקָ֑ם <WH5359> na-Kam; the vengeance פְּעָמָ֥יו <WH6471> pe-'a-Mav his feet יִ֝רְחַ֗ץ <WH7364> yir-Chatz, he shall wash בְּדַ֣ם <WH1818> be-Dam in the blood הָרָשָֽׁע׃ <WH7563> ha-ra-Sha'. of the wicked

וְיֹאמַ֣ר <WH559> ve-yo-Mar shall say אָ֭דָם <WH120> 'A-dom So that a man אַךְ־ <WH389> 'ach- Surely פְּרִ֣י <WH6529> pe-Ri Verily [there is] a reward לַצַּדִּ֑יק <WH6662> latz-tzad-Dik; for the righteous אַ֥ךְ <WH389> 'ach Surely יֵשׁ־ <WH3426> yesh- verily he is אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, a God שֹׁפְטִ֥ים <WH8199> sho-fe-Tim that judgeth בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ba-'A-retz. in the earth
